name: Lust Academy - Season 2
description:
Return to the Academy


Cordale Academy still houses many secrets for its adventurous students. New classes, new interactions, and a whole lot of magic to discover. Are you ready to go back and explore its ancient secrets?

More Magical Love


New quests, new stories, new romance and more of the best adult animations you’ve ever seen! Are you ready to go back and get to know these wizards even more intimately?

Lead Your House To The Top


The house competition is back in full swing! Are you ready to lead Leonheart all the way to the top again? Exciting new rewards await those brave enough to try!

New Entrancing Animations


Your return to the Academy will treat you with a lot of new content. And of course, there are many new explicit animations to see! Get close to the girls (or boys) and enjoy the show! Can you unlock every single scene?

Hone Your Skills


All of our minigames are back! Ready to duel your way to the top? Get that all important money to help you unlock extra content? Show everyone you still got it in Lust Academy Season 2!
